snippet: Wall Street deal makers and chief executives are getting their groove back. | Despite an investigation into suspicious trading, SAC Capital Advisors is holding on to its largest outside investor, the Blackstone Group. | Carl C. Icahn officially has a...
abstract: Wall Street deal makers and chief executives are getting their groove back. | Despite an investigation into suspicious trading, SAC Capital Advisors is holding on to its largest outside investor, the Blackstone Group. | Carl C. Icahn officially has a dog in the Herbalife fight. | Elizabeth Warren grilled top banking regulators in her inaugural appearance as a member of the Senate Banking Committee.
